description:
What is it: Defines external collaborator settings including who can invite external collaborators and if restrictions will be placed on external users. 
 Simeon Notes:  Defaults in Azure allow all users and guests to invite external parties, Simeon's baseline only allows authorized users with the guest inviter role to invite external parties. 
 Learn More: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/external-identities/delegate-invitations
